# opslevel_integration (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "opslevel_integration" "deploy" {
    filter {
        field = "name"
        value = "deploy"
    }
}
```

- `filter` (Block List, Min: 1, Max: 1) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--filter))
